name: Hibercon Technologies
description:
Hibercon provides full-cycle iOS app development services. Share your idea, discuss the concept, get your app ready and sell it on AppStore with us right now.
Services:
- Timeline and cost estimation. - iPad Apps development - iPhone Apps development - Apps Distribution in AppStore - Apps Promotion
Benefits:
- Deep Focus We develop apps only for iOS devices.
- Broad market coverage Our apps are available in 9 languages at 50 countries.
- Flexibility We work both with companies and with private persons.
- Happiness Our aim is to make our customers fully satisfied. We are aimed to provide a real solution for your business needs. For you. For people.
- Rationality We use only those tools we really need to make you happy, instead of implementing all those mainstream techniques or standards.
